name: ClpLinearObjective

algorithms.name:
Linear Objective c'x with Gradient Access
Implements the standard LP objective: minimize c'x. This is a thin wrapper
around a coefficient vector that implements the ClpObjective interface.

For quadratic objectives (x'Qx/2 + c'x), see ClpQuadraticObjective.

see: ClpObjective for the abstract objective interface
ClpModel for how objectives are stored in the model
